name: Night Strangers
description:
Night Strangers is a short visual novel viewing Eliot's point of view on life.  It is based on what Hirigo Kobayashi (aka the writer/script) has been feeling for the past months.

-3 endings

-Original Sprite by Potato Man (Our lead artist)

-4 CGs

TW: Mentions of suicide, depression, and flashing lights may occur. Viewer discretion is advised. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Synopsis:

With Eliot’s broken sleep schedule, he wakes up middle of the night. Hungry, sad, lonely, and needs “something” in his life. He now finds himself downstairs where he meets his aunt Samantha working and watching something on the television. Eliot is now in a spot where he has free time to do whatever he wants at the night. He asked his aunt if he can go out and his aunt said to do whatever, but she doesn’t care. He now wonders about the night, going somewhere to fulfill his needs. He finds himself in a local bar where he encounters a girl named Alice. What will happen between these two-night strangers?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
